title: Law
description: Schema for data sovereignty laws and regulations

id.description: Unique identifier for the law (URL-safe slug)

name.description: Short display name of the law

full_name.description: Full official name of the law
examples: Clarifying Lawful Overseas Use of Data Act

year.description: Year the law was enacted or last significantly amended

summary.description: Brief description of the law's purpose and key provisions

url.description: URL to the official text or authoritative source

enumDescriptions.bloc: Applies to a group of countries (e.g., EU, EEA)
enumDescriptions.state: Applies to a sub-national jurisdiction (e.g., US state, German LÃ¤nder)

applies_to.description: List of jurisdiction IDs where the law applies

type.description: Primary purpose or category of the law

enumDescriptions.privacy: Protects individual data rights and privacy
enumDescriptions.access: Enables government or law enforcement data access
enumDescriptions.localization: Requires data to be stored within jurisdiction
enumDescriptions.security: National security framework without direct data access provisions
enumDescriptions.sector: Regulates specific sector (AI, telecom, finance, etc.)

government_access.description: Level of government access to data enabled by the law

enumDescriptions.broad: Bulk collection, minimal oversight, backdoor requirements, or extraterritorial compulsion
enumDescriptions.targeted: Access with warrants or court orders for specific investigations
enumDescriptions.limited: Strong procedural safeguards, narrow scope, independent oversight
enumDescriptions.none: No government access provisions in this law

data_protection.description: Level of individual data protection provided

enumDescriptions.strong: Comprehensive rights (access, erasure, portability), strong enforcement, independent DPA
enumDescriptions.moderate: Some protections but with significant exceptions or weaker enforcement
enumDescriptions.weak: Limited rights or broad government/national security exemptions

extraterritorial.description: Whether the law claims jurisdiction beyond the country's borders

requires_localization.description: Whether the law requires data to be stored within the jurisdiction

requires_backdoor.description: Whether authorities can compel decryption, backdoor access, or technical assistance
